trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of comparison to be used when filtering data.
trans-unit.target: 指定篩選資料時所要使用的比較型別。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <c>Filter</c> method definitions in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator" /> class that take the <paramref name="CompareMethod" /> argument.
trans-unit.target: 採用 <paramref name="CompareMethod" /> 引數之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator" /> 類別中的 <c>Filter</c> 方法定義會使用這個列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod> enumeration represents a comparison type for certain filtering operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.CompareMethod>列舉，代表特定篩選作業的比較類型。

trans-unit.source: By default, if the filtering criteria are met, a data point is either removed or marked as empty.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，如果符合篩選準則，資料點移除或標示為空白。

trans-unit.source: However, data points can be filtered even if they do not match the filtering criteria, by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，資料點可進行篩選，即使它們不相符的篩選準則，藉由設定<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>屬性`false`。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value is equal to the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值等於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value is less than the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值小於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value is less than or equal to the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值小於或等於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value is more than the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值大於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value more than or equal to the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值大於或等於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。

trans-unit.source: If the data point value is not equal to the compared value, the point is filtered.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料點的值不等於比較值，則會篩選此資料點。
